commitMessage:
@@@[GOBBLIN-221] Add Json to Avro converter and bytes to Json converter

Add JsonRecordAvroSchemaToAvroConverter and
BytesToJsonConverter

Address comments

Closes #2072 from jack-moseley/master

@@@[GOBBLIN-923]GOBBLIN-923] Fix Array and Map JsonElement converters to handle nullable elements

This change fixes the converters below to check if
the JsonElement
they are invoked with is a JsonNull and handle it
accordingly.

  - JsonElementConversionWithAvroSchemaFactory::Arra
yConverter
  - JsonElementConversionWithAvroSchemaFactory::MapC
onverter
  - JsonElementConversionFactory::ArrayConverter
  - JsonElementConversionFactory::MapConverter

Closes #2779 from ahmedahamid/master
